overview.en: Qitmeer is the next generation-public chain based on Block DAG,Metrics among the security, openness, fairness and scalability.Qitmeer adopts a classic POW consensus and UTXO data model and designs a unique asset issuing mechanism which requires the reserve of base currency.HLC is ERC20 token of Qitmeer network.
overview.zh: Qitmeer是以BlockDAG技术为支撑的全球新一代公链，也是第一条专注普惠金融和伦理金融的公链。BLOCKDAG的合作记账模型实现了安全性、开放性、公平性、可扩展性四者的合理平衡，采用经典POW共识和UTXO数据模型，独创的以底层币为基础价值且需审核的通证发行机制，契合了平等金融的哲学。HLC是Qitmeer主网发行的一个ERC20token。
